attributes.action: Close all caravan parks, static, touring and camping for the foreseeable future.
attributes.additional_details:
No one else can authorise these closures.
People are not being g sensible and rational themselves.
attributes.background: Close the sites as people are travelling to them along with the virus. They are putting additional pressures on services in local areas where hospitals and shops have a lot less staff and stocks than in the larger areas where people have travelled from.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was started, the Government has issued guidance on further businesses and premises to close. The Government has said that exemptions apply where people live permanently in caravan parks or are staying in caravan parks as interim abodes where their primary residence is not available. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close-guidance

The Government has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
